channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
channel.desc: Fantasy film sequel starring Daniel Radcliffe, 2004. Hogwarts is put on high alert when Harry Potter's godfather escapes from Azkaban Prison after 12 years there.

channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: M&S
channel.desc: Guest expert Mark Wright joins hosts Vernon Kay and AJ Odudu as the remaining amateur designers compete for a dream mentorship with high street giant M&S in Menswear Week.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Beat the Chasers
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as more contestants from across the UK are willing to take on The Sinnerman, The Beast, The Governess, The Menace, The Vixen and The Dark Destroyer to win big.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Coldwater
channel.desc: Dark-humoured thriller series. Fiona reconsiders her marriage to John when some unsettling truths come to light, and John steels himself to face the consequences for his actions.

channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Big Brother
channel.desc: The iconic house has had a fresh lick of paint and is ready to welcome a new cast of housemates from all walks of life as they take up residence in the Big Brother house.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Heathrow
channel.desc: Heathrow is visited by the President of the United States aboard Air Force One 13 years after its last visit, and Ian has his hands full out on the apron.

channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.title: Motorsport UK

channel.title: Nisha Katona's Home Kitchen
channel.desc: Cooking series. Nisha Katona cooks a spicy egg and cauliflower curry, a Himalayan chilli and cheese toastie with tamarind chutney, and some sweet Hungarian plum dumplings.
